intro: Become the best bus driver in the world!
description:
Coach Bus Driving Simulator puts you in the driver’s seat and lets you become a real Bus Driver! Featuring detailed maps all from over the world, a wide variety of modern coach buses with realistic interiors and a groundbreaking 1:1 physics engine. Get behind the wheel and drive your bus to complete all the routes!

This coach bus simulator game features beautiful stylized graphics, a wide variety of buses to choose from, and multiple cities from around the world to explore in career mode, free ride! Immerse yourself in this ultimate driving simulator and become the master driver. Try now this completely realistic coach bus simulator!

GAMEPLAY
• Many coach models available!
• Career, Free-ride 
• Intelligent Traffic System
• Open/Close Doors button, animated people entering/exiting the bus
• Next-gen simulator -> 1:1 bus physics and sounds.

DRIVE
• With realistic bus physics and stunning landscapes, every drive is an adventure in this bus driving simulator, one of the most complete bus games!
• Multiple time of day and weather conditions to choose from.
• Choose your favorite coach bus for transporting passengers over long distances!

MAPS
• Locations of any kind: city, countryside, mountain, desert and snow.
• Realistic open world maps like USA, Europe, Asia, Middle-East

TUNING
• Lots of bus customization options including paint, accessories, body parts, air conditioning, flags, decals or performance parts!
• Detailed and customizable interiors.

Experience the joy of driving in one of the most realistic bus games on the market. Take the wheel in your hands, feel the weight of your bus and master the road in our driving simulator. Become the best bus driver in the world with Coach Bus Driving Simulator!
